tnet

Class TSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • tnet.TSocket
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TSocketCom

    public class TSocket
extends java.lang.Object
    A TSocket is able to connect to a ServerSocket and exchange data

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected SocketStreams clientConnection
      The Socket and its streams saved in a SocketConnection
      private java.lang.String ip
      The IP the ServerSocket is going to open() to
      private int port
      The port the ServerSocket is going to open() to
      private java.net.Socket socket
      The Socket of this TSocket

    • Constructor Summary

      A new TSocket with a preexisting Socket

      Saves the ip and port and runs open()

      • TSocket

        public TSocket(java.lang.String ip,
               int port)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the ip and port and runs open()
        Parameters:
        String - ip The IP the socket is going to connect to when open() is called
        int - port The port the socket is going to connect to when open() is called
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if e.g. port is already used

      • TSocket

        public TSocket(java.lang.String address)
        throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the ip and port and runs open()
        Parameters:
        String - address The IP and port from String-Format "192.165.78.34:23422"
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if e.g. port is already used
